backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and listings with access control, CRUD operations, and query filters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three game‑loop and sprite‑loading fixes to affected frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including styles, routing, hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable overrides defining light/dark color tokens and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the app root and main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in theme provider, profile setup dialog, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading state, error handling, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Route guard that shows a sign‑in prompt when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/images/ImageUrlF: Empty placeholder file for image URL input fields.
frontend/src/components/images/SafeImage: Empty placeholder file for a safe image component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer showing copyright and a caffeine.ai attribution link with dynamic hostname tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, mobile sheet menu, and login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper including header, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/listings/Listing: Empty placeholder file for a listing card component.
Empty placeholder file for listing filter UI.
Empty placeholder file for the listing creation/edit form.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter a name and save it via a mutation.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/game/audio/useMusicTrack.ts: Hook that loads and loops a music track, handling play, pause, and muting based on state.
frontend/src/game/audio/useSfx.ts: Hook providing throttled sound‑effect playback with cached audio elements and mute support.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Defines grid, speed, scoring, spawn intervals, planet effects, and other core game constants.
frontend/src/game/hooks/useGameLoop.ts: Main game loop hook managing game state, sprite loading, input, spawning, and rendering logic.
frontend/src/game/render/entities.ts: Rendering helpers for snake, UFOs, cows, penguin bosses, and crocodiles using sprite sheets.
frontend/src/game/render/obstacles.ts: Re‑exports obstacle rendering helpers for UFOs, cows, and the penguin boss.
frontend/src/game/render/sprites.ts: Sprite manager that loads assets and provides functions to draw clipped or full sprites with pixel‑art settings.
frontend/src/game/render/starfield.ts: Creates and animates a twinkling starfield background with drifting stars.
frontend/src/game/render/vfx.ts: Renders laser beams and explosion animations using sprite sheets and timing.
frontend/src/game/skins/catalog.ts: Contains metadata for available snake skins including IDs, names, descriptions, and colors.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Type definitions for directions, snake, obstacles, bosses, power‑ups, and overall game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/ControlsHintOverlay: UI overlay displaying keyboard, touch, and mouse control hints.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameHUD.tsx: Displays the player's score, level, and planet badges using styled UI components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns the current user's identity, profile, and authentication status using Internet Identity and profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling authentication, stored identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines queries and mutations for fetching and saving the current user's profile via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom space-themed color variables plus layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero banner, navigation buttons, and feature descriptions for the game.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays a styled leaderboard using mock data and highlights top player rankings.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: UI for selecting game modes, starting local play, and placeholder multiplayer lobby actions.
frontend/src/pages/PlayPage.tsx: Renders the main gameplay page, wiring up the canvas, game loop, audio, pause/mute controls, and loading/error overlays.
frontend/src/pages/SellListingPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for selling listings, currently without implementation.
frontend/src/pages/SkinsPage.tsx: Displays available snake skins with previews, ownership state, and equip buttons, using placeholder ownership logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters and session-stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s state, scope, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the Spacecoco game.
